about_the_game:
We've taken down the medieval props from the Workshop and created a free DLC package for everyone! The days of medieval enthusiats rooting through the workshop to find all the pieces for the set is no more!

All props have an alternate material (available on your vr controller's radial dial menu) for changing them to an alternate color or metal shader.

*The props in the medieval room are positionally locked. You can unlock all props and move them around by pressing the menu button once while pointing at each prop.

*The included room and props are themed after MyDream Interactive's favorite Netfix show! Be the King of your own castle in the north!

Medieval.room
This room starts you inside your own medieval castle chambers. Decorate it and arrange it to your taste!

13 Props:
  • Bed
  • Bench
  • Wood Chair
  • Wood Thrown
  • Chain Chandelier
  • Wood Desk
  • Goblet
  • Ottoman
  • Rug
  • Large Table
  • Armore & Swords Wall Decor
  • Axe & Sheild Wall Decor

name: VR Toolbox: Medieval Castle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1 or 10. Win 7 not supported
  • Processor: Intel i7-920 minimum, Intel i5-4590 or greater recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, or Windows MR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A set of medieval props inspired by one of our favorite television series. This prop set will allow you to be the king of your own castle! We've taken down the medieval props from the Workshop and created a free DLC package for everyone.
